object.name: SuggestedPostPaid
object.description: Describes a service message about a successful payment for a suggested post.
object.html_description: Describes a service message about a successful payment for a suggested post.
object.rst_description: Describes a service message about a successful payment for a suggested post.

annotations.description: Message containing the suggested post. Note that the Message object in this field will not contain the reply_to_message field even if it itself is a reply.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Message containing the suggested post. Note that the Message object in this field will not contain the reply_to_message field even if it itself is a reply.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Message containing the suggested post. Note that the :class:`aiogram.types.message.Message` object in this field will not contain the *reply_to_message* field even if it itself is a reply.
annotations.name: suggested_post_message

annotations.description: Currency in which the payment was made. Currently, one of 'XTR' for Telegram Stars or 'TON' for toncoins
annotations.html_description: Currency in which the payment was made. Currently, one of “XTR” for Telegram Stars or “TON” for toncoins
annotations.rst_description: Currency in which the payment was made. Currently, one of 'XTR' for Telegram Stars or 'TON' for toncoins
annotations.name: currency

annotations.description: The amount of the currency that was received by the channel in nanotoncoins; for payments in toncoins only
annotations.html_description: Optional. The amount of the currency that was received by the channel in nanotoncoins; for payments in toncoins only
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The amount of the currency that was received by the channel in nanotoncoins; for payments in toncoins only
annotations.name: amount

annotations.description: The amount of Telegram Stars that was received by the channel; for payments in Telegram Stars only
annotations.html_description: Optional. The amount of Telegram Stars that was received by the channel; for payments in Telegram Stars only
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. The amount of Telegram Stars that was received by the channel; for payments in Telegram Stars only
annotations.name: star_amount
